author: lightclient
content: Thanks to all the people who were able to be at the `mev-boost` session in person at devconnect yesterday. Some great feedback on the API - just wanted to a drop a link to the PR that will add the API to the `execution-apis` repo. If you weren't able to make the meeting or want to take a second look at the latest revisions, please see the PR: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/209
